00025         class _BSAPI Controller : public DeepMemoryPoolObject
00026         {
00027                 // Struct for controlling smooth interpolation of an Emitter member variable.
00028                 struct MemberController
00029                 {
00030                         float time;
00031                         bstype speed;
00032                 };
00033 
00034                 // Stores an instance of an Emitter, and structures for controlling its variables.
00035                 struct EmitterInstance
00036                 {
00037                         Emitter* emitter;
00038                         bstype special[NUM_SPECIAL_MEMBERS];
00039                         bstype baseX, baseY;
00040 
00041                         MemberController controllers[NUM_SPECIAL_MEMBERS];
00042                         uint32 activeControllers;
00043                 };
00044 
00045                 // Event structure, contains a pointer to a shared CodeRecord which contains the
00046                 // bytecode for this event.
00047                 struct Event
00048                 {
00049                         String name;
00050                         int numArguments;
00051                         CodeRecord* code;
00052                 };
00053 
00054                 bool mEnabled;
00055 
00056                 ScriptMachine* mScriptMachine;
00057

00060 
00061                 int mNumEmitters;

00063                 // Array of events.
00064                 Event* mEvents;
00065 
00066                 int mNumEvents;
00067 
00068                 // Blocks

00076                 // Weak pointer to user-supplied object.
00077                 void* mUserObject;
